import React,{useState}from"react";import YourBotArmy from"./YourBotArmy";import BotCollection from"./BotCollection";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BotsPage(){//start here with your code for step one
const[selectedBots,setSelectedBots]=useState([]);// adds a bot to YourBotArmy and is passed as a prop
function addToArmy(bot){if(!selectedBots.some(selectedBot=>selectedBot.id===bot.id)){setSelectedBots([...selectedBots,bot]);}}// returns a bot to BotCollection and is passed as a prop
function releaseFromArmy(bot){setSelectedBots(selectedBots.filter(selectedBot=>selectedBot.id!==bot.id));}// deletes a bot from YourBotArmy and is passed as a prop
function dischargeFromService(id){setSelectedBots(selectedBots.filter(selectedBot=>selectedBot.id!==id));fetch("http://localhost:8002/bots/".concat(id),{method:"DELETE"}).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>console.log(data)).catch(error=>console.error(error));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YourBotArmy,{onDelete:dischargeFromService,bots:selectedBots,releaseFromArmy:releaseFromArmy}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BotCollection,{addToArmy:addToArmy,onDelete:dischargeFromService})]});}export default BotsPage;
